name: Scutter (itch)
description:
Study your path through the environment before the lights go out.

NOTE: This game is still in development.

How To Play

You have a few seconds to memorize the walls before the background changes colour. Points are gained by moving from one side of the room to the other. The round ends when the timer reaches zero. Avoiding walls will score you bonus points

Collect powerups to gain advantages.

  • Bonus time adds 5 more seconds on the timer.
  • Multiplier increases points given per score.
  • Light Bugs float around to show wall-less areas.
  • Speed Up increases the rate you move.
